concept.title: 1052.219-18 Notification of competition limited to eligible 8(a) concerns - Alternate III (Deviation) (MAY 1998).

conbody.p: In accordance with 1019.811-3(d)(3), substitute the following for the paragraph (c) in FAR 52.219-18:
(c) Any award resulting from this solicitation will be made directly by the contracting officer to the successful 8(a) offeror selected through the evaluation criteria set forth in this solicitation.
